context: The word 'euroopa' is the Estonian language name for Europe. It is used to refer to the continent of Europe in geographical, cultural, and political contexts. In Estonian grammar, it can appear in different cases - as shown in the dictionary entry with 'gen' (genitive case) form and 'indekl' (indeclinable) usage examples related to specific species like Euroopa lehis (European larch), piison (bison), and naarits (marten).
